title: Business Feature: Implementation Manager can onboard customers for Juniper SD-LAN/WIFI
description:
Description
The Business Feature: If customer is not known in SNow, the implementation manager can onboard the customer consisting of the Epics/Enablers:
  The assumption here is that there is no need to adapt the GUI and customer onboarding, as this can be done by SD-WAN (product-independent/generic). However, a mapping must be done here.
Enabler: Create GUI for adding BRIM and PSP-element enrichment https://jira.devops.telekom.de/browse/SNOWTC-10695 
Enabler SD-LAN/WiFI: Customer Onboarding (based on Juniper MIST) https://jira.devops.telekom.de/browse/SNOWTC-10327   

Business Scope:
Implementation Managers can process the Juniper SD-LAN/WIFI product through to Site Enrichment in Order Management. This includes Customer Master Data, Commercial and Technical Onboarding.
acceptance_criteria:
Implementation Managers can use the following features:
Customer Master Data
Commercial Onboarding
Technical Onboarding
Process, IT workflow and frontend pages are aligned.
